#include<stdio.h>

#define mod 100000007
#define n 1000000
int main()
{
	int ar[n+100];
	int i, j, k, t, temp;
	for(i=0;i<=n;i++)
		ar[i]=0;
	ar[1]=1;
	for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
		for(j=i+i;j<=n;j+=i)
		{
			ar[j] = (ar[j]+ar[j-i])%mod;
		}
	scanf("%d", &t);
	while(t--)
	{
		scanf("%d", &temp);
		printf("%d\n", ar[temp]);
	}
	return 0;
}
